        African Steel Mills Nigeria Limited is a leading Manufacturer and Supplier of Steel Products, including Steel Bars.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Finance Manager",
  "description": "Estrada International Staffing Solutions (EISS) is a leading HR consulting and talent solutions firm dedicated to helping organizations attract, develop, and retain exceptional talent. We provide comprehensive human resource services across recruitment, outsourcing, background verification, and HR advisory, ensuring our clients achieve sustainable business growth through people excellence.

With a commitment to quality, speed, and professionalism, we partner with organizations of all sizes, ranging from multinationals to indigenous SMEs; across diverse industries. Our tailored solutions are designed to simplify HR processes, enhance workforce capability, and deliver measurable impact.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Structure: Hybrid
Sector: HR Consulting

About The Job


	Are you a detail-oriented financial strategist with a deep-rooted background in core accounting? Do you possess the analytical rigor of a researcher and the creative spark of an innovator? If you have honed your skills within the high-stakes environment of a consulting firm, we want you on our team.
	At Estrada International Staffing Solutions, we don&#39;t just manage numbers; but the profitability of our business. We are looking for an Accountant who can transform raw data into strategic insights and drive financial excellence through innovation.


Your Mission


	Financial Reporting &amp; Analysis: Oversee the preparation of accurate and timely financial statements, providing deep-dive analysis into variances, trends, and performance metrics.
	Strategic Research: Conduct thorough financial research and market intelligence to advise leadership on investment opportunities, cost-saving initiatives, and industry benchmarks.
	Process Innovation: Identify inefficiencies in current financial workflows and design innovative, automated solutions to streamline reporting and accounting cycles.
	Accounting: Manage complex accounting tasks, including tax compliance, audits, and internal controls, with the precision and standard expected in a top-tier consulting environment.
	Budgeting &amp; Forecasting: Lead the annual budgeting process and provide rolling forecasts that reflect real-time business shifts and research-backed projections.


What You Bring


	Education: A Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or Economics. Professional certification (ACA, ACCA) is an added advantage.
	Experience: A minimum of 3 years of core accounting experience, with a mandatory background in a consulting firm or professional services environment.
	Analytical Rigor: You are naturally research-driven and possess the ability to &quot;see through&quot; the numbers to identify underlying business drivers.
	Reporting Mastery: Exceptional skills in financial reporting; you can present complex data in a way that is clear, actionable, and visually compelling.
	Innovative Mindset: You are not content with the &quot;status quo&quot; and are always looking for ways to use technology or new methodologies to improve financial accuracy.
	Technical Proficiency: Advanced mastery of Microsoft Excel (Modeling, Power Query) and experience with robust accounting software/ERPs.


Salary

Finance Manager Job at Estrada International Staffing Solutions (EISS)




        
    

        
        Estrada International Staffing Solutions (EISS) is a leading HR consulting and talent solutions firm dedicated to helping organizations attract, develop, and retain exceptional talent. We provide comprehensive human resource services across recruitment, outsourcing, background verification, and HR advisory, ensuring our clients achieve sustainable business growth through people excellence.

With a commitment to quality, speed, and professionalism, we partner with organizations of all sizes, ranging from multinationals to indigenous SMEs; across diverse industries. Our tailored solutions are designed to simplify HR processes, enhance workforce capability, and deliver measurable impact.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Manager

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Structure: Hybrid
Sector: HR Consulting

About The Job


	Are you a detail-oriented financial strategist with a deep-rooted background in core accounting? Do you possess the analytical rigor of a researcher and the creative spark of an innovator? If you have honed your skills within the high-stakes environment of a consulting firm, we want you on our team.
	At Estrada International Staffing Solutions, we don't just manage numbers; but the profitability of our business. We are looking for an Accountant who can transform raw data into strategic insights and drive financial excellence through innovation.


Your Mission


	Financial Reporting & Analysis: Oversee the preparation of accurate and timely financial statements, providing deep-dive analysis into variances, trends, and performance metrics.
	Strategic Research: Conduct thorough financial research and market intelligence to advise leadership on investment opportunities, cost-saving initiatives, and industry benchmarks.
	Process Innovation: Identify inefficiencies in current financial workflows and design innovative, automated solutions to streamline reporting and accounting cycles.
	Accounting: Manage complex accounting tasks, including tax compliance, audits, and internal controls, with the precision and standard expected in a top-tier consulting environment.
	Budgeting & Forecasting: Lead the annual budgeting process and provide rolling forecasts that reflect real-time business shifts and research-backed projections.


What You Bring


	Education: A Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or Economics. Professional certification (ACA, ACCA) is an added advantage.
	Experience: A minimum of 3 years of core accounting experience, with a mandatory background in a consulting firm or professional services environment.
	Analytical Rigor: You are naturally research-driven and possess the ability to "see through" the numbers to identify underlying business drivers.
	Reporting Mastery: Exceptional skills in financial reporting; you can present complex data in a way that is clear, actionable, and visually compelling.
	Innovative Mindset: You are not content with the "status quo" and are always looking for ways to use technology or new methodologies to improve financial accuracy.
	Technical Proficiency: Advanced mastery of Microsoft Excel (Modeling, Power Query) and experience with robust accounting software/ERPs.


Salary
N300,000 Gross Monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@estradaintl.com using "Finance Manager" as the subject of the email.

title: Job Openings at Nigeria Sinotruck Limited
content:
Nigeria Sinotruck Limited is a commercial automotive company that is interested in starting a vendor leasing desk.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.)  Import Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	The Import Officer will play a critical role in managing and coordinating the company’s end-to-end importation process — from receipt of the Proforma Invoice (PFI) from manufacturers through insurance processing, banking activities, customs clearance, and final delivery of goods to company premises.
	The position focuses on achieving cost-effective importation, ensuring timely delivery, minimizing operational bottlenecks, and responding efficiently to unforeseen challenges.
	Capable of working both independently and collaboratively within a team.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field with 2-3 years’ experience in similar role
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	High attention to detail and accuracy.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to drive business growth and customer satisfaction
	Hand on experience on Import process.
	Proficiency in utilizing accounting software and Microsoft tools (e.g., Sage ERP, SAP).
	Demonstrated experience in leadership roles.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: fafolabi13@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: This role is located in Head Office, not for a person that will always be in Port.

 

2.) Fleet Analyst

Job Location: Ota, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking organized, diligent, and responsible individual to join our growing team, which primary objective will be to analyze and evaluate the performance of Customer’s Fleet within the organisation.


Job Responsibilities


	Preparation of workshop status report (Daily, Weekly and Monthly)
	Prepare, plan and analyse service schedule of the entire fleet within jurisdiction in line with standard maintenance procedure
	Project, update and monitor service compliance and reporting of all customer’s truck within jurisdiction
	Estimate all workshop inspections, activities and secure approval in accordance to standard procedure and policies
	Update all necessary information on ERP promptly and ensure compliance
	Prepare, Coordinate and follow up SLA/ retail bills with proper documentation and submit same for payment in line with the existing contract
	Reconcile invoice status with customers weekly for prompt approvals
	Contribute to team effort by carrying out any other related job assigned by the Line manager.
	Performing research and analytical work for Fleet Services Department, particularly in the areas of cost management, vehicle replacement schedules, performance benchmarking, action plan tracking
	Controlling costs by ensuring that vehicles are maintained properly and efficiently.


Requirements


	OND in Mechanical Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics or its equivalent
	Minimum of two years work experience in Fleet Management or similar role
	Analytical mind with ability to make accurate mathematical computations
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Competencies in data entry, analysis, and management
	Keen attention to detail and ability to effectively manage time
	Intermediate competency in the use of Excel and other packages, and knowledge of ERP.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fafolabi13@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Storekeeper

Job Location:  Sagamu, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking organized, diligent, and responsible individuals to join our growing team.
	Your primary objective will be to maintain adequate levels of stock to meet daily distribution demands within the organization.


JobResponsibilities


	Upon receipt of goods in the stockroom, the storekeeper shall unpack the delivered items and check the contents against documents that list the contents of the delivery, verifying that it has been received in full
	Inspect deliveries for damage or discrepancies and report those to the Head of Store and Head, Internal Audit/Control for reimbursements and record keeping
	Organize spare parts and marks them with identifying codes and place those items for storage in place according to the existing inventory system.
	Keep inventory records current, periodically counting inventories to compare against the records.
	Recommends items needing to be replenished to the Head of Store in a timely manner.
	Ensure adequate record keeping and manage all documentation to confirm proper stock levels and maintain inventory control according to the policies
	Ensure safe keeping of items in the store in order to avoid damages
	Perform other stock-related duties including returning, packing, pricing, and labeling supplies etc
	Perform any related tasks as assigned.


Requirements


	OND Only in Mechanical Engineering, Accounting, Store Management, Purchasing Management, Business Management or its equivalent
	Minimum of two years work experience in Store Management or similar role
	Analytical mind with ability to make accurate mathematical computations
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Competencies in data entry, analysis, and management
	Keen attention to detail and ability to effectively manage time
	Intermediate competency in the use of Excel and other packages, and knowledge of ERP.


Application Closing Date: 20th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fafolabi13@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
